author: JetMETdqmval
body: All modules which are modified are now cloned first. This should fix the issues observed in the unscheduled modes for MET Validation and JetMET DQM. As consequence the type1 MET folders will be renamed. Updated the PUJetID producers to the latest version (training still based on 53X though).
title: JetMET DQM and MET Validation unscheduled mode fix
